## Project Specifications
- **Type**: Python voice AI agent
- **Platform**: Windows primary, Linux support
- **LLM**: LMStudio local inference
- **STT**: Whisper (OpenAI)
- **TTS**: Coqui TTS
- **Tools**: MCP server integration
- **Async**: Python AsyncIO orchestration
